text: Grady Tate (January 14, 1932 - October 8, 2017) was an American hard bop and soul-jazz drummer and singer. He was born in Durham, North Carolina. He was known with a distinctive baritone voice. In addition to his work as sideman, Tate has released many albums as leader and vocalist as well as lent his voice to a number of songs in the animated Schoolhouse Rock! series. Tate died on October 8, 2017 at his Manhattan, New York home at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American drummers Category:American jazz musicians Category:American soul musicians Category:Musicians from North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:People from Durham, North Carolina
title: Grady Tate
